price: যিটো ছাঁ শীতলো নহয় আৰু ই অগ্নিশিখাৰ পৰা ৰক্ষাও নকৰিব,
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
